content: the feathered hat is a ribbed chevron toque/beanie knit from the brim up the stitch pattern is designed to showcase speckled and variegated yarns instructions for four sizes are included baby to adult large to fit heads ranging from 17 to 24 in circumference for all sizes the pattern uses less than one skein each of a speckled or variegated colour for the main body of the hat and two semi-solid or tonal contrasting colours for the brim and pompom three colour kits made specifically for this pattern are available in our shop 1 each kit contains the yarn to make any one size of the feathered hat including one main colour and two contrast colours for the brim and pompom 1 https //flockfibrestudio com/collections/yarn-pattern-kits
